title: Spring
blurb: Continuing our Spring session with more goodies. This month: Cedric will show us how to get started on mobile development, and Rowan will introduce Grunt.js for managing your builds and tasks in your awesome JS projects.

speakers.title: Getting Started With Vanilla Mobile Apps
speakers.name: Cedric Dugas
speakers.synopsis: Thinking about doing a mobile web app? See what issues you really don't want to tackle and learn some tips & tricks to get started.

speakers.title: Grunt.js
speakers.name: Rowan Udell
speakers.synopsis: A practical introduction to using the task runner GruntJS in your projects. More than just a build tool, Grunt makes it easy to automate your common tasks. Leverage concepts you already know, and an abundant ecosystem of plugins to quickly and easily improve your day-to-day workflow.
